New York City braces for a cold and wet holiday weekend, while recent incidents include a Bronx building blaze injuring 12 and a fatal stabbing, alongside significant political developments as Attorney General Letitia James faces indictment amid ongoing mayoral race dynamics.

### Risks & Alerts

- NYC and NJ brace for cold and wet weather this holiday weekend.
